title: What are the best motivational speech videos on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: The video below has motivated me during my exams. ALL the exams during my undergrad( the day before :P, just when you need them the most) and boy did it help. I , instinctively ,turned off my phone and got to the grind !  Type in "Motivational speeches " in youtube and you'll find many videos using excerpts of this video. Like an ultimatum. Helps with all things needed to motivate. :D. Hope it helps ypu too!
It has to be of Sri Gaur Gopal Das ji's .The way he shares his thoughts to his veiwers or listeners is unexplainable.One has to see his videos to get motivated.
